sen.j: 下京区（しもぎょうく）は、京都市を構成する11区のひとつである。
sen.e: Shimogyo Ward is one of the eleven wards consitituting Kyoto City.
Shimogyo Ward is one of the eleven wards consitituting Kyoto City.
Shimogyo Ward is one of the eleven wards that constitute Kyoto City.
sen.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。

sen.j: 北辺を通る四条通の四条烏丸（烏丸通）から四条河原町（河原町通）までは京都府、京都市有数の繁華街となっている。
sen.e: The area between Shiho-Karasuma (Karasuma-dori Street) on Shijo-dori Street, which constitutes the northen border of this ward, and Shijo-Kawaramachi (Kawaramachi-dore-Street) is one of the most bustling shopping and entertaiment areas in Kyoto Prefecture as well as in Kyoto City.

The area between Shiho-Karasuma (Karasuma-dori Street) on Shijo-dori Street, which constitutes the northen border of this ward, and Shijo-Kawaramachi (Kawaramachi-dore-Street) is one of the most bustling shopping and entertaiment areas in Kyoto Prefecture as well as in Kyoto City.

The area between Shijo-Karasuma (Karasuma-dori Street) on Shijo-dori Street, which constitutes the northern border of this ward, and Shijo-Kawaramachi (Kawaramachi-dori Street) is one of the most bustling shopping and entertainment areas in Kyoto Prefecture as well as in Kyoto City.
sen.cmt: スペルを修正しました。

sen.j: また、京都駅は、京都市周辺部のターミナルであり、周辺には京都タワー・京都駅ビルなどを中心に商業施設が集まっている。
sen.e: Kyoto Station is a terminal reached from areas around Kyoto City, and many commercial facilities, such as the Kyoto tower and the Kyoto Station building, are located around it
Kyoto Station is a terminal reaching to surrounding areas in Kyoto City, and many commercial facilities, such as the Kyoto tower and the Kyoto Station building, are located around it
Kyoto Station is a terminal reaching to surrounding areas in Kyoto City, and many commercial facilities, such as the Kyoto Tower and the Kyoto Station building, are located around it.
sen.cmt: ピリオドを追加しました。Kyoto Towerとしました。

sen.j: 早くから業務地化が進み、人口は30年以上にわたってドーナツ化現象により減り続けていたが、1995年以降都心回帰に伴う居住地再整備やマンション建設の増加に伴い再び人口が増加傾向に転じている。
sen.e: With more and more businesses advancing into this area, the population conitued decreasing for more 30 years due to so-called donut phenomenon, but since 1995, the population has increased because, corresponding to people's tendency for living in city centers, conditions of the residential area have been improved and increasingly more condominiums have been constructed.

With more and more businesses advancing into this area, the population has continued to decrease for more 30 years due to the so-called donut phenomenon, but since 1995, the population has increased because, corresponding to people's tendency for living in city centers, conditions of the residential area have been improved and an increasing number of condominiums have been constructed.

With more and more businesses advancing into this area, the population had continued to decrease for more than thirty years due to the so-called donut phenomenon, but since 1995, the population has increased because, corresponding to people's tendency for living in city centers, conditions of the residential area have been improved and an increasing number of condominiums have been constructed.
sen.cmt: 数字をスペルアウトしました。

sen.j: 2005年に行われた国勢調査においても、隣接する中京区や南区 (京都市)などと並び人口増加区のひとつとなった。
sen.e: According to the census conducted in 2005, Simogyo Ward wa one of the wards, together with adjacent Nakagyo Ward and Minami Ward (of Kyoto City), where its population had increased,.
According to the census conducted in 2005, Simogyo Ward wa one of the wards, together with adjacent Nakagyo Ward and Minami Ward (of Kyoto City), which saw an increase in population.
According to the census conducted in 2005, Shimogyo Ward was one of the wards, together with adjacent Nakagyo Ward and Minami Ward (Kyoto City), which saw an increase in population.
sen.cmt: スペルを修正しました。
他の記事と統一しました。

sen.j: 河川 堀川 (京都府)、鴨川 (淀川水系)、高瀬川 (京都府)
sen.e: Rivers: Hori-kawa River (in Kyoto Prefecture), Kamo-gawa River (in the Yodo-gawa River water system) and Takase-gawa River (in Kyoto Prefecture)
Rivers: Hori-kawa River (in Kyoto Prefecture), Kamo-gawa River (in the Yodo-gawa River water system) and Takase-gawa River (in Kyoto Prefecture)
Rivers: Hori-kawa River (Kyoto Prefecture), Kamo-gawa River (Yodo-gawa River system) and Takase-gawa River (Kyoto Prefecture)
sen.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。

sen.j: 1879年（明治12年）4月10日 京都府に下京区ができる。
sen.e: April 10, 1897: Shimogyo Ward was established in Kyoto Prefecture.
April 10, 1897: Shimogyo Ward was established in Kyoto Prefecture.
April 10, 1879: Shimogyo Ward was established in Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 1889年（明治22年）4月1日 上京区と合併して京都市が発足。
sen.e: April 1, 1889: This ward was merged with Kamigyo Ward to inaugurate Kyoto City.
April 1, 1889: This ward was merged with Kamigyo Ward to inaugurate Kyoto City.
April 1, 1889: This ward was merged with Kamigyo Ward to inaugurate Kyoto City.

sen.j: 上京区と下京区は共に京都市の行政区となる。
sen.e: Each of Kamigyo Ward and Sakyo Ward became an administrative ward of Kyoto City.
Each of Kamigyo Ward and Sakyo Ward became an administrative ward of Kyoto City.
Each of Kamigyo Ward and Shimogyo Ward became an administrative ward of Kyoto City.
sen.cmt: 下京 に修正しました。

sen.j: 1929年（昭和4年）4月1日 上京区と下京区の2区より中京区、東山区を分区する
sen.e: April 1, 1929: Nakagyo Ward and Higashiyam Ward were generated by separating Kamigyo Ward and Sakyo Ward.
April 1, 1929: Nakagyo Ward and Higashiyam Ward were generated by separating Kamigyo Ward and Sakyo Ward.
April 1, 1929: Nakagyo Ward and Higashiyama Ward were generated by separating Kamigyo Ward and Shimogyo Ward.
sen.cmt: 地名スペルを修正しました。

sen.j: 1955年（昭和30年）9月1日 下京区から南区 (京都市)を分区する
sen.e: September 1, 1955: Minami ward (of Kyoto City) was generated by separating Shimogyo Ward.
September 1, 1955: Minami ward (of Kyoto City) was generated by separating Shimogyo Ward.
September 1, 1955: Minami Ward (Kyoto City) was generated by separating Shimogyo Ward.

sen.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。
